item.title: Congress govt keeps fine rice scheme promise
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: District Collector B M Santosh has urged all eligible beneficiaries to make the best use of the high-quality fine rice being distributed by the government.
On Wednesday, the District Collector, along with Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy, launched the prestigious fine rice distribution programme in the 35th and the 26th wards of Gadwal town. As part of the Telangana state government’s initiative to enhance food security for the poor, fine rice is being distributed free of cost as a...]]>
item.author: The Hans India

item.title: Royals’ plea to protect historic ‘Kottabavi’
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Members of the Kishtareddy Bangla royal lineage, including Suhasini Reddy, Vikramasimha Reddy, and Venkata Krishna Reddy, met with District Collector B M Santosh to discuss the ongoing issue surrounding Kottabavi (Janakamma Bhavi) in Gadwal. They provided insights into the historical significance of the well and urged the Collector to take necessary legal action against individuals attempting to encroach upon this historic site and erase its traces.
The delegation emphasized that Gadwal...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
